AI Description: The Consensus Computational Suite (CCS) is a collection of open-source tools and algorithms for analyzing, visualizing, and interpreting data in the context of consensus algorithms. It includes various modules for sequence assembly, genome scaffolding, variant calling, and haplotype phasing.
Core Features: Sequence Assembly, Genome Scaffolding, Variant Calling, Haplotype Phasing
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Sequence Analysis, Genomics
